response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a special offer tailored to meet your needs and ensure you get the most out of this investment. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 12000}
